ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observation data in the ionosphere taken by the MU radar (Text format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The 1-hour average observation data of ion drift velocities, electron and ion temperatures and echo power in the ionosphere taken by the MU radar at Shigaraki in Shiga Prefecture, Japan (34.86N, 136.11E, 385m MSL), which has been operated in the incoherent scatter observation mode. The data are stored in the text file named (year)(month)(day)_(variable).txt. The variable abbreviations are dv, teti, pwr1, pwr2, pwr3, and pwr4 which mean plasma drift, electron and ion temperatures and echo powers for radar beam 1-5 directions, respectively. The plasma drift data include nine kinds of drift velocity components for eastward and northward/upward directions perpendicular to the magnetic field line, southward/upward direction parallel to the magnetic field line, vertical direction calculated from northward and southward beams, vertical direction calculated from eastward and westward beams, and for beam 1-4 directions, respectively. The azimuth and zenith angles of beam 1, 2, 3, and 4 are (355.0, 20.0), (85.0, 20.0), (175.0, 20.0), and (265.0, 20.0), respectively, in unit of degree. The temperature data include electron and ion temperature, their error values, condition code and signal to noise ratio between 228.5 and 724.6 km. The echo power data show the intensity of electromagnetic wave reflected from the ionosphere between 80 and 1,200 km for radar beam 1-4 directions. The value of -999.0 means missing data. Local time (UT + 09:00) is used for time data. The plasma drift and temperature data are essential for understanding of ionospheric plasma dynamics and chemical reactions of electron and ions in the middle latitude.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire MU radar data, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as MU radar data provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Sun-earth Interactions Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Ion Chemistry/Ionization

Parameter.Name: year
Parameter.Description: Year in the form YY where YY = the last two digits of year (00-99).

Parameter.Name: month
Parameter.Description: Month in the form MM where MM = month of year (01-12).

Parameter.Name: day
Parameter.Description: Day in the form DD where DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh where hh = hour of day (00-23). Local time (UT + 09:00:00) is used for time data.

Parameter.Name: Vperp_e
Parameter.Description: Ion drift velocity (eastward direction perpendicular to the magnetic field line)

Parameter.Name: Vperp_n
Parameter.Description: Ion drift velocity (northward/upward direction perpendicular to the magnetic field line)

Parameter.Name: Vpara_u
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity (southward/upward direction parallel to the magnetic field line)

Parameter.Name: Vz_ns
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity (vertical direction calculated from northward and southward beams)

Parameter.Name: Vz_ew
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity (vertical direction calculated from eastward and westward beams)

Parameter.Name: Vd_b1
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity for beam 1 direction (azimuth angle:355.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: Vd_b2
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity for beam 2 direction (azimuth angle:85.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: Vd_b3
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity for beam 3 direction (azimuth angle:175.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: Vd_b4
Parameter.Description: Ion Drift Velocity for beam 4 direction (azimuth angle:265.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: Ti
Parameter.Description: Ion temperature

Parameter.Name: Te
Parameter.Description: Electron temperature

Parameter.Name: icon
Parameter.Description: Condition code (0 is normal. 0, 1 and 4 are available)

Parameter.Name: er_ti
Parameter.Description: Error of estimate for ion temperature

Parameter.Name: er_te
Parameter.Description: Error of estimate for electron temperature

Parameter.Name: er_tr
Parameter.Description: Error of estimate for Tr (= Te/Ti)

Parameter.Name: snr
Parameter.Description: Signal to noise ratio

Parameter.Name: pwr1
Parameter.Description: Echo power for radar beam 1 (azimuth angle:355.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: pwr2
Parameter.Description: Echo power for radar beam 2 (azimuth angle:85.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: pwr3
Parameter.Description: Echo power for radar beam 3 (azimuth angle:175.0, zenith angle:20.0)

Parameter.Name: pwr4
Parameter.Description: Echo power for radar beam 4 (azimuth angle:265.0, zenith angle:20.0)
